00032 unsigned int JMA_CType_SJIS::getByteCount(const char* p) const
00033 {
00034         assert(p);
00035         const unsigned char* uc = (const unsigned char*)p;
00036 
00037         if(uc[0] == 0)
00038                 return 0;
00039 
00040         if(uc[0] < 0x80)
00041                 return 1; // encoding in ASCII
00042 
00043         assert(uc[1]);
00044         return 2; // encoding in SHIFT-JIS
00045 }
00046 
00047 bool JMA_CType_SJIS::isSpace(const char* p) const
00048 {
00049     assert(p);
00050 
00051     const unsigned char* uc = (const unsigned char*)p;
00052 
00053     if(uc[0] < 0x80)
00054         return isspace(uc[0]); // check by std library
00055 
00056     //full-width space in SHIFT-JIS
00057     if(uc[0] == 0x81 && uc[1] == 0x40)
00058         return true;
00059 
00060     return false;
00061 }

00063 }
